## Gabon

### gab_86

The MetaBiota data does not have coordinates, but Shapiro cites Mylne for the location. 

```{r}
gab_86_point <- tribble(
  ~latitude, ~longitude,
  0.091, 14.218 
) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords=c("longitude", "latitude"), crs=4326) 
```
